QuestData.Title: Summoning Shadra
QuestData.Description: The idol is prepared, $n. I trust that you are as well?$B$BYou will go southwest to Shadra'Alor ahead of us with the idol. You'll need to use the idol at each of the three temples.$B$BWhen you do that, Shadra will be summoned to this realm. The Deathstalkers and I will be along shortly to subdue and harvest her body. Speak with the lookout I've sent ahead once you've performed the ritual, and await my arrival.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Idol of Shadra at the Northwestern, Southwestern, and Eastern Temples in Shadra'Alor.
QuestData.RewardText: Marnal draws close... and Shadra even closer. Prepare for bloodshed.
